org.agilewiki.jactor2.osgi

Class LocateService<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.osgi.LocateService<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor, ServiceChangeReceiver<T>

    public class LocateService<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceChangeReceiver<T>
    Locates (or waits for) a service.
